Preterit.turoyo: u=ḥaloqo shəḏle aʕle b-u=ḥŭḏ̣ūr d-u=šulṭono w-d-ar=rabe d-i=mamlăke kulle 68; 27/49, 50;
translations: der Haarscherer ablegte gegen ihn Zeugnis in Gegenwart des Sultans und aller grossen des Reiches

Infectum.turoyo: u=mede də-ḥzeli, hayo ko-sohaḏnoLB 153; Mḥammad bări me d-howe (…) b-karse d-i=emo, aloho kṯule, i=šăhad-aṯe d-ko-səhḏína-la, ʕal əšme d-kətwa u=nbiyo d-aloho
translations: ‘nur das, was ich gesehen habe, bezeuge ich’;
‘Before Muhammad was born, while he was in his mother’s womb, God had written the creed which we maintain about him (Muhammad), that he is the prophet of God’ JL 20.7.42;
